translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, we have begun our descent into Moscow.
translation.ja: 間もなくモスクワに 到着します

translation.en: Please turn off all portable electronic devices. Thank you.
translation.ja: 電子機器の電源を お切り下さい

translation.en: It can interfere with the plane's navigation system.
translation.ja: 計器類に支障を及ぼします
信じてるの？ みんな噂してる

translation.en: Because people have been talking outside the flight attendant...
translation.ja: 信じてるの？ みんな噂してる フライトアテンダントの 陰謀で⸺
フライトアテンダントの 陰謀で⸺

translation.en: ...and word is that nobody really believes that.
translation.ja: フライトアテンダントの 陰謀で⸺ 実は誰も信じてないって

translation.en: Excuse my friend. He was dropped on his head as a child.
translation.ja: こいつ 子供の時 頭から落ちて

translation.en: If these were that bad, they wouldn't let you bring them on.
translation.ja: 本当なら持ち込み禁止だろ

translation.en: Just, if you agree with me... ...don't unfold your arms.
translation.ja: 同感なら腕をほどかないで

translation.en: Dude, you need an extra minute of playing Dora the Explorer?
translation.ja: 着陸ギリまで ゲームするか？

translation.en: She was about to save the Crystal Kingdom.
We just experienced an electrical short.
translation.ja: 電気系のショートです

translation.en: To your right, you see electrical activity...
translation.ja: 右側に見える雷雲の 影響ですが⸺

translation.en: ...in the upper stratosphere. Nothing of major concern.
translation.ja: 右側に見える雷雲の 影響ですが⸺ 心配ありません

translation.en: Due to electrical storms, all outbound flights are canceled.
translation.ja: 雷のため全ての離陸便は 欠航です

translation.en: When was the last time you wore that?
But I still dressed up out of solidarity.
All right, give me a Sharpie.
One of these days, I'm not gonna have a Sharpie in my bag.
translation.ja: マジック持ち歩くの やめる

translation.en: - Another poignant metaphor for me? - Yes.
translation.ja: それ 皮肉？ そうだ

translation.en: It's an exclusive social network for globe- trotting travelers.
It's a GPS- based navigation system that allows young people...
translation.ja: “ＧＰＳナビ機能で 若者たちに⸺”

translation.en: ...to find the hottest bars and clubs in cities around the world.
translation.ja: “世界のホットな 情報を提供”

translation.en: Our expansion plans for Moscow include getting drunk, laid...
translation.ja: “モスクワでは 酒からセックスまで⸺”

translation.en: ...and ending up in a Russian prison.
translation.ja: “モスクワでは 酒からセックスまで⸺” “激ヤバな情報を 提供します”

translation.en: All at the click of a button.
translation.ja: “激ヤバな情報を 提供します”

translation.en: Is it me or does Cyrillic look like Klingon?
translation.ja: キリル文字 変じゃないか？

translation.en: Come on. I found that freaky Zvezda joint we're gonna hit up for our victory lap.
translation.ja: 今夜の祝勝会は “ズベズダ”にしようぜ
スーパーモデルが 出会いを求めてる

translation.en: When the Russians go for this, we're a 10- million- dollar company.
translation.ja: プレゼン成功で 俺たち大金持ち

translation.en: Fifty- six travelers currently logged into Moscow.
translation.ja: モスクワで 56人 ログイン中

translation.en: I didn't fly halfway around the world to see Americans.
translation.ja: 地球を半周してまで 会いたくないよ

translation.en: - Tell her to go to Applebee's. - Zvezda? Zvezda.
translation.ja: 地球を半周してまで 会いたくないよ ズベズダ…

translation.en: Have I ever let you down?
We'll let Skyler make the introductions.
translation.ja: スカイラーが待ってる

translation.en: Guys, what are you doing here?
translation.ja: おいおい　何しに来た？

translation.en: Didn't you get my e- mail?
Hang on. My boy just spent, like, 12 grand to develop this.
translation.ja: ソフトの開発に １万2000ドルかかった

translation.en: What the hell is going on? Looks exactly like my idea.
translation.ja: それは俺のアイデアだ

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It's very good. It's almost perfect, thank you.
translation.ja: ああ　すばらしいよ 次回は秘密保持契約書を 送ってくれ

translation.en: Next time, you send an NDA.
translation.ja: 次回は秘密保持契約書を 送ってくれ

translation.en: You must mean the Non- Douchebag Agreement.
translation.ja: クソ野郎契約書のことか

translation.en: Skyler, why are you doing this?
Security will help see you out.

translation.ja: こんなこと あるかよ

translation.en: No. This map says we're only two blocks away.
translation.ja: いいえ　もうすぐよ

translation.en: All right. Hold up, hold up.
So how did we find this place?
Yeah. I mean... ...if he's the one on the left.
translation.ja: ええ　左側の男はね

translation.en: His friend is wearing a Snuggie with a bolo tie.
translation.ja: 右側は毛布にボロータイよ

translation.en: If I end up some human lampshade in this guy's basement--
translation.ja: 殺人鬼っぽくてヤバそう

translation.en: Relax. I'm giving you a no- lampshade guarantee.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　殺されないわよ

translation.en: I'm like, We have to go up there, right?
Screw it. Big picture, this doesn't mean shit.
translation.ja: 忘れろよ 大したことないって

translation.en: It does mean shit. Our future is exactly shit right now.
translation.ja: 俺たちの将来は 完璧に終わった

translation.en: Get a huge international Matlock- ass lawyer who knows Russian law.
translation.ja: ロシアの法律に詳しい 弁護士を雇って

translation.en: Just don't sweat it. We'll figure something out.
How can you be like that?
Like delusionally optimistic all the time.
translation.ja: おめでたいくらい楽観的だ

translation.en: I'm just more used to screwing up than you are.
translation.ja: お前より打たれ強いからな

translation.en: I try and get mad at you....

translation.ja: おい　あの女を見ろよ

translation.en: Guys, you're here. It's impressive. That's good research.
translation.ja: モスクワ一(いち)のクラブを よく見つけたね

translation.en: Look, you can't be so naive, okay?
translation.ja: 世の中は厳しいんだよ

translation.en: You come out here, everybody out here is like hungry wolves.
translation.ja: 飢えた狼が ウヨウヨしてる

translation.en: And you act like little lambs, you're gonna get eaten.
translation.ja: 弱い羊はすぐに食われる

translation.en: You may like to think of yourself as a wolf... ...so you can sleep at night.
translation.ja: お前は眠れない時 狼を数えるのか？

translation.en: But the truth is, you're just a straight- up thief.
You have to understand, this is business.
Oh, thanks. Your mom left it in my room.
No human society exists without booze or religion.
translation.ja: 酒と宗教なしに 人間社会は存在しない
だから俺は信じて飲む

translation.en: Snuggie, 6 o'clock. I told you his friend is hot.
translation.ja: 毛布男よ　友達はイケメン

translation.en: What happened? Are you guys millionaires or something?
translation.ja: 億万長者になったから？

translation.en: Or just the loyal friend of a full- of- shit wingman?
translation.ja: ただの引き立て役 だったりして

translation.en: Well, thanks for the tip. It's definitely living up to expectations.
translation.ja: クラブの情報ありがとう

translation.en: Sean's actually the man who finds this stuff.
translation.ja: 情報収集はショーンが

translation.en: Can I get a lager? A beer?
translation.ja: “なぜ急にモスクワへ？ ママより”

translation.en: Only what he learned in Rocky IV.
translation.ja: 「ロッキー４」で 覚えたけど

translation.en: Anyway, I'm on my way to Nepal. Shooting photos.
translation.ja: ネパールで写真を撮って 展覧会を開くの

translation.en: - I'm trying to get them into this gallery. - You will get in.
translation.ja: ネパールで写真を撮って 展覧会を開くの 開けるわ

translation.en: And Nat here is my faithful assistant and my best girl.
translation.ja: ナタリーは助手で親友よ

translation.en: Well, I did have other plans this summer, but they fell through...
translation.ja: 私自身の予定が ダメになって⸺

translation.en: ...so I quit my job and left my mom a note.
translation.ja: 会社辞めて 来ちゃったの

translation.en: - And here I am. - Why would you do that?
translation.ja: 会社辞めて 来ちゃったの なぜ急に？

translation.en: Okay, can we not talk about that?
So, what do you actually do?
He likes basking in the possibility. Right?
translation.ja: 常に可能性を 残しておくこと

translation.en: Or just never having to commit to anything.
Photo time. No dumb- ass faces, no peace signs. Come on now.
translation.ja: 写真を撮るわよ “ピース”はなし

translation.en: What did you do now, Sean?
- My phone's dead. - Whole block's dark.
translation.ja: 電池切れよ 真っ暗だ

translation.en: Get in there. Go, go, go.
- What are those things? - I don't know.
translation.ja: 何なの？ 分からない

translation.en: - Are we trapped down here? - He's dead.
translation.ja: どうしよう 死んでる

translation.en: What do they want? They're killing everyone. They're shredding people.
translation.ja: 次から次へ殺しまくってる！

translation.en: - Where did it come from? - Annie, what's going on?
translation.ja: どこから来た？ 何が起きたの？

translation.en: It isn't safe up there. I saw it.
- What are those things? - They're invisible.
translation.ja: 何者だ？ 俺たちには姿が見えない

translation.en: - We can't see them. - What's happening?
translation.ja: 俺たちには姿が見えない

translation.en: There's nowhere to go, they're everywhere.
You really think that you're the only person down here?
translation.ja: ツライのは みんな同じだ ツライのは みんな同じだ 月曜日
最後の食料だ “召しあがれ”

translation.en: Like, the thousandth time is the charm?
How long since we heard them?
I said 27 hours, give or take an hour.
translation.ja: 静かになって 27時間くらい

translation.en: Unless you wanna stay down here pissing in tin cans forever....
translation.ja: このまま じっとしてる気か？

translation.en: It's time to go. We're gonna head to the U.S. Embassy.
translation.ja: ここを出て 米国大使館へ行こう

translation.en: We should go to the Swedish Embassy, it's closer.
translation.ja: スウェーデン大使館が近い

translation.en: See if they have any water, food, supplies.
translation.ja: 水と食料がないか探そう

translation.en: Just take what you can. Take this.
You think they're gone? Like gone gone?
translation.ja: やつらは もういない？

translation.en: - Is it gonna be like this all over? - We can't be the only ones.
translation.ja: 生存者はいない？ きっといる

translation.en: Do you know where we're going? I just wish we had a plan that didn't come from some takeout menu.
translation.ja: そんなテキトーな地図で 道が分かるのか？

translation.en: Nobody's gonna find us in the storeroom. Stay here or find your embassy. Nobody's stopping you.
translation.ja: ここにいても助けは来ないぞ 好きにしろよ

translation.en: It's a big city. There has to be more people out there.
translation.ja: 大都会だ 必ず生存者がいる

translation.en: - Oh, shit. You okay? - You okay? Just wait, guys.
Wait, wait, wait. This way, come on.
Wait, you hear that? Come on, this way.
translation.ja: 聞こえるか？ こっちだ

translation.en: Go away. You will bring ghosts with you.
Everyone in the city is dead.
- Keep moving. - Thank you so much.
translation.ja: 早く大使館へ どうも

translation.en: We don't know where they are.
- Goddamn it, we're lost. - We're not lost.
Do you know where you're going?
No, I think once we cross the bridge--
This doesn't inspire confidence. We don't know anything--
translation.ja: あの３人は あてにならない

translation.en: There's another bridge right over there.
What's important is that you and I stick together, okay?
translation.ja: 私たちが離れないことが 大事よ

translation.en: Guys, come on. It's back this way.
- That cop car will have a better map. - Yeah.
You guys wait over there. - Let's go. - All right.
Give me that. You're taking too long.
We don't know these things can see or hear.

translation.ja: 発炎筒 地図だ　ロシア語だ
地図だ　ロシア語だ

translation.en: We'll count off blocks from landmarks.
No! Wait. Get down. Get down.
Where'd it go? Can you see it?
translation.ja: どこ行った？ 見えるか？

translation.en: Yeah, that's the plan, right? Stick together.
translation.ja: 離れるなと言ったでしょ

translation.en: Did you see that dog? It killed the dog. It killed the dog.
translation.ja: あの犬を見たか？ やつら 犬を殺した

translation.en: It's the wind. Stop freaking out!
I'm the only one freaking out here?
This wasn't how I thought my week would go. I'm trying to keep my freak- out inside.
translation.ja: 俺もビビってるけど こらえてるんだよ
スカイラー　行くぞ

translation.en: The faster we get to the embassy, the faster we get home.
translation.ja: 早く着けば早く帰れる

translation.en: - You don't know that. - Of course they are.
translation.ja: ウソよ みんな死んだ

translation.en: Say it's like this everywhere. Five of us, we're here in Moscow and we're alive.
translation.ja: 俺たちのように助かった者が 必ずいる

translation.en: Okay? I doubt we're the five luckiest people on the planet.
translation.ja: 俺たち５人だけの わけがない

translation.en: Which makes for millions of survivors in other cities all over the world.
translation.ja: 世界中に生存者が いるはずだ

translation.en: It doesn't even matter anymore. Don't you understand?
I mean, we take one step outside and we're dust.
translation.ja: 外へ出れば粉々にされる

translation.en: We can't even see these things.
The way it lit up... ...that cop car. Electricity gives it away.
translation.ja: やつらが通った時 パトカーの赤色灯が光った
街灯や ヘッドライトも

translation.en: You're right. - Daytime's more dangerous than night. - We should go outside...
translation.ja: そうね 昼間の方が危険だわ

translation.en: Not as dumb as I thought.
Looks like the embassy is about a mile away.
You gonna get it right this time?
translation.ja: 今度は迷わずに着けるか？

translation.en: Are you gonna be less of an asshole?
translation.ja: 少しは いたわれよ

translation.en: I just want us to make smart choices. That--
translation.ja: 賢い選択をしたいだけだ

translation.en: Is that what you call what happened at the club? Making a smart choice?
translation.ja: デートの相手を 殺すのが そう？

translation.en: I think we all want to be...

translation.ja: 勇敢でいたいと思ってる

translation.en: But the truth is that you don't know who you are...
translation.ja: でも 自分が 本当にそうかは⸺

translation.en: ...until something happens. And then you just react.
translation.ja: それが試される場面に 直面して初めて分かる

translation.en: And I just-- I see these...
translation.ja: 彼女を見捨てた瞬間が⸺

translation.en: ...two seconds just playing over and over and over again.
translation.ja: 頭に こびりついて離れない

translation.en: What's the dress code for the end of the world? Jacket, no tie?
translation.ja: 世界の終わりには ジャケットとタイ？

translation.en: Sorry, buddy. I'm gonna have to take this.
translation.ja: 悪いけど ジャケット 借りるよ

translation.en: - Hey, wait. No. - Are you crazy?
- It was close, why didn't it see us? - The glass.
translation.ja: なぜ気づかずに？ ガラスだ
ええ 生体電磁波を感知するんだ
生体電磁波を感知するんだ だからね

translation.en: - How'd you come up with that? - I don't know, Shark Week.
translation.ja: なぜ分かる？ サメがそうだ

translation.en: My money's on they see our electric pulses... ...and the glass blinded it.
translation.ja: 間違いない ガラスが電磁波を吸収した

translation.en: - An electrical insulator. - Willing to bet your life on that?
translation.ja: 絶縁体の役目を 命に賭けて？

translation.en: Come on, come on. Let's go.
What are you-- ? What do you-- ?
What are you gonna do with that?
You know how to use that thing?
I've seen enough. Let's just get the hell out of here.
translation.ja: もうたくさんだ　行こう

translation.en: Goddamn it, Sean. We don't know what's up there.
translation.ja: やつらがいたら どうする？

translation.en: Or where we're going for that matter. Listen, we need a better view.
translation.ja: だったら どこへ？ 上なら眺めがきく

translation.en: Somewhere where we can see what's going on. What direction's safe.
translation.ja: どこなら安全かも分かる

translation.en: You guys wanna get yourself killed?

translation.ja: “ブダペスト 1230 アントワープ 621”

translation.en: Their electromagnetic bombardment shorted our hardware. No missiles. No jets.
translation.ja: “敵の電磁波で ミサイルも戦闘機も不能”

translation.en: Communications stayed up for three minutes.

translation.ja: “ニューヨーク　ロンドン パリ　東京⸺”

translation.en: ...all reported invisible invaders. Aggressive assault strategy.
translation.ja: “各都市に 見えない侵略者が襲来”

translation.en: - Not like we remember it. - Oh, God.
Hardware from the underground survived their initial attack.
translation.ja: “地下にあった機材は 無事だった”

translation.en: We salvaged what we could, hope to reconnect with Antwerp, Budapest.
translation.ja: “ブダペスト アントワープと⸺” “再び交信を目指す”

translation.en: These aren't times. These are numbers of survivors.
translation.ja: 時刻じゃない 生存者の数だ

translation.en: We found an Emergency Action Message from allies here in Moscow.
translation.ja: “モスクワの同志からの 緊急行動指令”

translation.en: You said those things see electricity, so turn it off.
translation.ja: やつらに見つかる　消して

translation.en: Please, Sean, just turn it off.

translation.ja: ショーン　消して まただ

translation.en: Goddamn it, okay? Those things can see it, so turn it off!
translation.ja: やつらは電気が見えるのよ

translation.en: Come on. Let's find a view.
Ben? Over here, check this out.
translation.ja: ベン　ここから見える

translation.en: What are they doing out there?
It's like they're digging for something.
They gotta obey some sort of rules, have some sort of purpose.
translation.ja: 何か目的があるはずだ

translation.en: They came here with a plan.
They're out there, just have to find them.
What the hell is he doing?
Come on. We gotta stop him.
He can translate the message for us.

translation.ja: 待ってくれ　何か見えた

translation.en: He's dead, he's dead. He's dead.
- Yes, you can. - No, I can't. Yes, you can! You have to.
translation.ja: しっかりして　頑張るのよ

translation.en: All we're doing is buying time.
That's gotta be what Skyler saw.
translation.ja: スカイラーが見たのは

translation.en: The sun's about to come up. No way.

translation.ja: 行けるさ 血迷ったのか？

translation.en: What is wrong with you? After what just happened to Skyler?
translation.ja: 血迷ったのか？ スカイラーの二の舞いだぞ

translation.en: - That could happen to any of us. - Listen!
translation.ja: スカイラーの二の舞いだぞ あの生存者は こんな状況を生き抜いてる

translation.en: That person is surviving right in... ...the middle of all this.
translation.ja: あの生存者は こんな状況を生き抜いてる

translation.en: And whoever it is... ...they're gonna understand this message.
translation.ja: このメッセージも 理解できるはず

translation.en: And if I'm not giving up, you're not giving up.
Do you want to die, assholes?

translation.ja: 次はちゃんとノックして

translation.en: Come this way. Come with me.
Quickly, we must close the cage!
It's why you and Vika are still alive.
We don't really understand much Russian.
I turned on the light to attract survivors.
translation.ja: 明かりは生存者への合図だ
最初はこの子 次は君たちが来た

translation.en: Mr. Sergei calls it a Faraday cage.
The steel bars ground... ...external electrical currents.
translation.ja: 鋼鉄のバーが 電磁波を遮断するの
うまくいってるみたい

translation.en: You mean it keeps them away?
They can't smell us if we're inside.
translation.ja: 中にいれば気づかれない

translation.en: - It's a shark cage, bro. - Mr. Sergei thinks...
translation.ja: サメの檻だ やつらは電磁波でできてる
やつらは電磁波でできてる

translation.en: They are made up of lethal wave energy.
translation.ja: 〈やつらの正体は⸺〉 〈死の電磁エネルギーだ〉

translation.en: That's why they're invisible to us.

translation.ja: モスクワは その電磁波で⸺

translation.en: You gotta listen to this. It's repeating a broadcast or something.
translation.ja: 聞いて　何かを繰り返してる
“原子力潜水艦 Ｋ-152 ネルパ”

translation.en: Oh, my God. The Russian navy.
translation.ja: すごい　ロシア海軍よ

translation.en: A nuclear submarine... ...in the Moskva River.
translation.ja: 原子力潜水艦が モスクワ川にいる

translation.en: Shielded nuclear power. An undersea Faraday cage.
translation.ja: 原子力潜水艦は 海中のファラデー･ケージ

translation.en: You mean it can get us out of here?
We have to get on that sub.
One from the U.S... ...leaving Nova Scotia.
translation.ja: 米国の潜水艦が ノバスコシアに

translation.en: A British submarine waiting in the English Channel.
translation.ja: 英国の潜水艦が 英国海峡に

translation.en: We have to go when it's dark.
Gives us five, six hours. Is that enough time?
translation.ja: 出航まで５～６時間 間に合う？

translation.en: It says they are in the north end of the river.
translation.ja: 川の北端にいると 言っている

translation.en: You think we can cross the city?
Can you help me gather supplies?
We're fine. You've done this a hundred times, right?
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ 今まで何度も？

translation.en: Just close the cage. Make sure it's locked.
translation.ja: ケージの扉を閉めて カギをかけて

translation.en: Power comes from here... ...and fires incredible microwave there.
translation.ja: ここでパワーを発生し ここから電磁波を放射する

translation.en: A focused and compressed microwave beam. I calculate...
translation.ja: 強力な電磁波ビームだ 私の計算どおりなら やつらを破壊できる

translation.en: ...enough high- density microwave could break up their energy field.
translation.ja: 私の計算どおりなら やつらを破壊できる
弱体化し たぶん殺せる
やつらは電磁エネルギーだ

translation.en: ...and if we can connect their charge...
translation.ja: 結合させることが できれば⸺

translation.en: Take a bunch out at once.

translation.ja: 人類初の宇宙人キラー

translation.en: This guy sings to his cat.
Yeah, but look at that cat. So, what do you think?
translation.ja: 気持ちよさそうだ 成功するかな

translation.en: I doubt the hope of humanity lies in homegrown science.
translation.ja: 変人が作った武器だぞ

translation.en: - What if it blows us all up? - Yeah, but what if it works?
translation.ja: 暴発して… 成功するかも

translation.en: - The apartment's upstairs. - You won't make it.
translation.ja: 上へ逃げるのよ 間に合わない 隠れ場所へ

translation.en: I know where we can hide. Come on.
translation.ja: 間に合わない 隠れ場所へ

translation.en: Nat, I can't move this table! I can't-- !
Aliens bad for homeland... ...but good for business.
translation.ja: エイリアン狩りは いい稼ぎになる

translation.en: Like a big alien stun gun.
translation.ja: エイリアン用のスタンガン

translation.en: When they generate their lightning, their power drains.
translation.ja: やつらは発光する時 パワーを消耗し⸺
透明化シールドが弱まる

translation.en: Sean, just leave it. Let's go.
We have dislodged fragments, but we can only wound them.
translation.ja: 殻をはぎ取ったが 傷つけただけだ

translation.en: Well, you can stay here as long as you need.
translation.ja: 好きなだけここにいろ

translation.en: There's a submarine in the river, it leaves in the morning.
translation.ja: 川に潜水艦がいて 朝に出航する

translation.en: It's joining others. One from the U.S.
translation.ja: 米国の潜水艦と合流する

translation.en: - You won't make it, Sean. - Why not? We made it this far.
translation.ja: たどり着けない ここまで来た

translation.en: You made it as far as Academy Plaza. And we made it here.
translation.ja: アカデミー･プラザからは 俺たちが助けた

translation.en: And we can make it further.

translation.ja: だが 周囲一帯は やつらがウヨウヨいる

translation.en: Enemy territory. You can't go through. You wanna go around?
Like this? It would take five weeks.
translation.ja: 迂回(うかい)すれば５週間かかる

translation.en: If your luck hasn't run out.

translation.ja: ここにいても 最後は殺される

translation.en: When the enemy are this strong... ...we can strike and run. Watching for weaknesses.
translation.ja: ゲリラ戦を挑みながら 敵の弱点を探る

translation.en: We return to camp, but we never retreat.
translation.ja: どんなに恐ろしい敵でも 決して屈しない

translation.en: So, yes. We'll die tomorrow, but today...
translation.ja: 明日死ぬかもしれない だが今日⸺

translation.en: ...we will kill at least one of the enemy.
I'm sorry, we cannot help you.
I know you think we don't have a chance...
Sean's right, we have to try.
translation.ja: そうよ　やるべきよ

translation.en: We wouldn't be here if it wasn't for you.
But what is the point in saving people if you don't see them home?
translation.ja: でも 最後まで助けなきゃ 意味がない

translation.en: Your mission is to dig in here... ...so you can die in a slightly different way?
translation.ja: ここに残って死ぬのが 使命なのか？

translation.en: We're gonna get on that submarine... ...get together with other survivors out there...
translation.ja: 潜水艦で脱出して 他の生存者と合流し⸺

translation.en: So why don't we get on that sub and get you and your men some real weapons?
translation.ja: 潜水艦へ行けば 武器も手に入る

translation.en: You have command until we get back.
Come on! Down to the tracks!
We will drift to the submarine.
It's okay. It's not your fault.

translation.ja: 俺の母親とベンの母親は ＰＴＡで一緒だった

translation.en: He was in the smart class. His mom made him play with me.
translation.ja: やつは選抜クラスで よく一緒に遊んだけど…

translation.en: I sort of never got over it.
translation.ja: 俺は劣等感の塊だった
お別れを言っておこう

translation.en: I never got a chance to say it to Ben.
translation.ja: ベンには言えなかった

translation.en: This is why they came. We're just in the way.
translation.ja: やつらの目的は これだったんだ

translation.en: Copper, nickel. Metals that conduct electricity.
translation.ja: 銅　ニッケル　他の金属 全て電気を通す

translation.en: We're gonna. It's our way out.
Her name's Natalie. She must have swam ashore upriver.
I watched your boat go over. I don't want to lose this one.
translation.ja: 転覆するのが見えた これ以上 待てない

translation.en: - We can't wait. - I won't leave her.
translation.ja: 転覆するのが見えた これ以上 待てない 置いてけない

translation.en: I had orders not to depart without survivors.
translation.ja: 生存者を乗せ すぐ出航しろとの命令だ

translation.en: - Now we have to sail. - Whose orders?
translation.ja: 生存者を乗せ すぐ出航しろとの命令だ 誰の？

translation.en: - I'll speak to him. Where is he? - Dead.
translation.ja: どこにいる？ 死んだ

translation.en: Look, I'm not asking you to go out there, okay? Just to delay your departure.
translation.ja: 助けに行けとは言わない 出航を待ってくれ

translation.en: This area is infested! I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 今ごろ彼女は殺されてる

translation.en: - Her chances for survival are not good. - She knows how to hide. Trust me.
translation.ja: 今ごろ彼女は殺されてる 隠れ方を知ってる

translation.en: He knows what his chances are.
And right now, every one of us count.
If she was one of yours, you'd want the same.
Okay. Let's get under and make a battle plan.
The new gun is almost ready.
The extra microwave gun gives us a chance.
...thought we could microwave their invisible shield.
...Mr. Sergei said that we need much more power.
translation.ja: もっと強力なパワーが 要ると言ってた

translation.en: More batteries will launch a stronger beam. You will get four or five shots.
translation.ja: バッテリーの強化で ４～５発 ぶちかませる

translation.en: We need to wrap the power packs so they don't short out.
translation.ja: ショート対策も必要だ

translation.en: Get the lead blankets out of radiation....
The microwave guns... ...disrupt their defense shields.
translation.ja: 電磁砲で 敵のシールドを破る

translation.en: We get to where the flares were fired, here...
translation.ja: 照明弾が上がったのは ここ
彼女を救出し 戻る
私がサーシャの代わりに

translation.en: Boris and me. Yuri and Sean.
translation.ja: ボリスと俺 ユーリとショーン
電磁砲を持つ者が先導

translation.en: Her flares came from that direction.
- It's water. - It'll connect its charge...
translation.ja: 水だ 水で連鎖反応が起きる

translation.en: - ...and create a chain reaction. - You are certain?
translation.ja: 水で連鎖反応が起きる 確かか？

translation.en: Wait until they're over the water to fire the gun.
translation.ja: 敵が水の上に来たら撃て

translation.en: It's Vika! Vika, what are you doing?
It's working. They're over the water.
- Shoot it again! - It's not working!
We did it. Let's go. We got them for now.
translation.ja: 戻るぞ ひとまず やっつけた
原潜は強力な武器だよ

translation.en: Today, we learned how to fight.
translation.ja: 敵を倒す方法が分かった

translation.en: Go, and teach the others what we know.
translation.ja: 他の生存者たちに 教えてやれ

translation.en: This is the last day of the extermination...
translation.ja: 人類滅亡の危機は去った

translation.en: I have Moscow at my back.
- There you are. - Did you get it?
Yes, I replaced the damaged parts. It will work inside the sub.
translation.ja: 部品を交換しました 使えますよ

translation.en: Here in London, I picked up signals from others around the globe. Europe, Asia, the States.
translation.ja: ここ ロンドンに世界中から 知らせが届いています

translation.en: I had contact with a militia group out of Paris.
They took down one of those mining towers.
I've been hearing all types of stories. I've got them here on tape.
translation.ja: 続々と勝利の声が 届いています
トロント　リマ ベルリン　上海

translation.en: - This is how it starts. - The list goes on.
